This plugin is developed for Eclipse Helios Version. You can download and install A4E by using the button _Eclipse-Marketplace_ on your eclipse.

= Discovery  =

Automatically, when you create your first project alloy, you will see appear the Alloy 4 models library. It contains all the models, examples and utility tools.   

http://alloy4eclipse.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/cap5.png 

 * Model Creation

Like java project, in your alloy project you can create alloy model in order to implement your relational models and your constraints.
